prompt: Subject: The Woman (late 20s, warm brown shoulder-length hair, creative attire). Context: Park bench at dusk during golden hour. Action: Sitting quietly, gaze following an elderly couple walking hand-in-hand; soft longing gradually softening her features. Style: Soft, warm cinematic aesthetic with intimate character focus. Composition: Medium shot establishing her on the bench, transitioning to tight close-up on her face as longing appears. Ambiance: Golden hour light casting warm earthy tones, soft natural lighting, introspective and gentle mood.
camera_movement: Slow pan right to track the elderly couple, then gentle tilt down to frame The Woman's face
